# Packages
```{r}
library(torch)
library(torchvision)
library(tidyverse)
library(reshape2)
library(matlib)
library(neuroCombat)
library(caret)
source("./code/utils2.R")
source("./code/data_loader.R")
source("./code/combat_module.R")
source("./code/predictor_module.R")
```

# Preprocessing
```{r}
set.seed(20)
raw <- read.csv("./data/raw.csv", header = F) %>% as.matrix()
covariates <- read.csv("./data/covariates.csv", stringsAsFactors = T)

cov <- model.matrix(~ SEX + DIAGNOSIS + AGE, covariates)[, -1]
# dummyVars(~ SEX + DIAGNOSIS + AGE, .) %>% 
# predict(newdata = covariates)
batch <- model.matrix(~ manufac, covariates)[, -1] %>% as.matrix()
# dummyVars(~ manufac, .) %>% 
# predict(newdata = covariates)
one_hot_batch <- covariates %>% dummyVars(~ manufac, .) %>% 
  predict(newdata = covariates)

combat <- neuroCombat(t(raw), batch = batch, mod = cov, ref.batch = 0)$dat.combat %>% t()

input_list <- list(data_raw = raw, cov = cov, batch = batch, one_hot_batch = one_hot_batch)

# all_resid_list <- input_list %>% 
#   residualize_data(is_split = F)

adni_ct <- adni_ct_dataset(input_list, data_type = "all", 
                           insert_new_batch = TRUE, new_batch = matrix(0, nrow = nrow(raw),
                                                                       ncol = 1))
adni_all_dl <- dataloader(adni_ct, batch_size = 64, shuffle = TRUE)
```

# Train adversarial CVAE
```{r}
n_latent_dim <- 15
adv_vae_model <- vanilla_vae(feature_dim = 62, latent_dim = n_latent_dim,
                         n_hidden = 4, n_batch = 1, n_covariate = 4, inject_decoder = TRUE)
adv_vae_optim <- optim_adam(adv_vae_model$parameters, lr = 0.001)

adv_model <- latent_adversary(n_latent = n_latent_dim, n_batch = 1)
adv_optim <- optim_adam(adv_model$parameters, lr = 0.01)

pre_trained <- train_nn(adni_all_dl, vae_model, vae_optim, 
                    n_epochs = 20, beta_mse = 0.8, beta_l1 = 0.2, beta_kl = 1)
adv_vae_model <- pre_trained$model
adv_vae_optim <- pre_trained$optim

trained <- train_adversary(adni_all_dl, adv_vae_model, adv_vae_optim,
                           adv_model, adv_optim, 
                           n_epochs_total = 40, n_vae_per_cycle = 1, n_adv_per_cycle = 1, n_initial_adv = 10,
                           beta_mse = 0.8, beta_l1 = 0.2, beta_kl = 1, beta_adv = 0.2)
adv_vae_model <- trained$model
adv_vae_optim <- trained$optim
adv_model <- trained$adv_model
adv_optim <- trained$adv_optim

adv_vae_output <- adv_vae_model$encode_decode(adni_ct)
col <- covariates$DIAGNOSIS
pairs(as.matrix(adv_vae_output$latent_mu)[, 1:12], col = col, lower.panel = NULL)

#adv_model(vae_output$latent_mu)
#vae_output$latent_mu
```

# Training VAE with covariates
```{r}
n_latent_dim <- 15
vae_model <- vanilla_vae(feature_dim = 62, latent_dim = n_latent_dim, 
                         n_hidden = 4, n_batch = 1, n_covariate = 4)
vae_optim <- optim_adam(vae_model$parameters, lr = 0.01)

trained <- train_nn(adni_all_dl, vae_model, vae_optim, 
                    n_epochs = 60, beta_mse = 0.8, beta_l1 = 0.2, beta_prior = 1, beta_ind = 5)
vae_model <- trained$model
vae_optim <- trained$optim
```

# Training VAE with covariates
```{r}
n_latent_dim <- 15
vae_model_inject <- vanilla_vae(feature_dim = 62, latent_dim = n_latent_dim, 
                         n_hidden = 4, n_batch = 1, n_covariate = 4, inject_decoder = TRUE)
vae_optim_inject <- optim_adam(vae_model_inject$parameters, lr = 0.01)

trained <- train_nn(adni_all_dl, vae_model_inject, vae_optim_inject, 
                    n_epochs = 60, beta_mse = 1, beta_l1 = 1, beta_prior = 1, beta_ind = 5)
vae_model_inject <- trained$model
vae_optim_inject <- trained$optim
```

# Train VAE w/o covariates
```{r}
n_latent_dim <- 20
vae_ncov <- vanilla_vae(feature_dim = 62, latent_dim = n_latent_dim, 
                        n_hidden = 4, n_batch = 1, n_covariate = 0)
vae_optim_ncov <- optim_adam(vae_ncov$parameters, lr = 0.01)

trained <- train_nn(adni_all_dl, vae_ncov, vae_optim_ncov, 
                    n_epochs = 60, beta_mse = 0.8, beta_l1 = 0.2, beta_prior = 1, beta_ind = 5)
vae_ncov <- trained$model
vae_optim_ncov <- trained$optim
```

# Train non-linear predictor
```{r}
pred_model <- predictor_network(n_feature = 62, n_batch = 1, n_covariate = 4, n_hidden = 3, dropout_rate = 0.3)
pred_optim <- optim_adam(pred_model$parameters, lr = 0.001, weight_decay = 0.01)

trained_model <- train_predictor(adni_all_dl, pred_model, pred_optim, n_epochs = 40)
pred_model <- trained_model$model
pred_optim <- trained_model$optim
```

# Train linear predictor
```{r}
linear_model <- predictor_network(n_feature = 62, n_batch = 1, n_covariate = 4, n_hidden = 0, dropout_rate = 0)
linear_optim <- optim_sgd(linear_model$parameters, lr = 0.001)

trained_linear_model <- train_predictor(adni_all_dl, linear_model, linear_optim, n_epochs = 10)
linear_model <- trained_linear_model$model
linear_optim <- trained_linear_model$optim
```

# Get predictions
```{r}
pred_model$eval()
linear_model$eval()

pred_output <- pred_model$predict(adni_ct)
linear_output <- pred_model$predict(adni_ct)
```

# Set up new dataset/dataloader with residuals
```{r}
nn_resid_list <- all_resid_list
nn_resid_list$data_raw <- adni_ct$data_raw - pred_output
adni_resid <- adni_ct_dataset(nn_resid_list, data_type = "all", 
                              insert_new_batch = TRUE, new_batch = matrix(0, nrow = nrow(raw),
                                                                          ncol = 1))
adni_resid_dl <- dataloader(adni_resid, batch_size = 64, shuffle = TRUE)

n_latent_dim <- 35
resid_model <- vanilla_vae(feature_dim = 62, latent_dim = n_latent_dim, n_hidden = 3, n_batch = 1, n_covariate = 4, inject_decoder = TRUE)
resid_optim <- optim_adam(resid_model$parameters, lr = 0.001)

trained_resid <- train_nn(adni_resid_dl, resid_model, resid_optim, n_epochs = 15, 
                          beta_mse = .8, beta_l1 = .2, beta_kl = 1)
resid_model <- trained_resid$model
resid_optim <- trained_resid$optim.

trained_resid <- train_nn(adni_resid_dl, resid_model, resid_optim, n_epochs = 15, 
                          beta_mse = .2, beta_l1 = .8, beta_kl = 1)
resid_model <- trained_resid$model
resid_optim <- trained_resid$optim

#resid_output <- resid_model$encode_decode(adni_resid, decode_from_new = FALSE)
resid_output_new <- resid_model$encode_decode(adni_resid, decode_from_new = TRUE)
#resid_sample <- resid_model$sample_from_latent(adni_resid, decode_from_new = TRUE, n_samples = 100)

is_same <- as.matrix(adni_resid$batch) == 0
round(as.matrix(resid_output_new$feat_recon - adni_resid$data_raw)[!is_same], 3)
#View(as.matrix(resid_output_new$feat_recon))
#View(as.matrix(resid_sample$feat_recon))
#View(as.matrix(adni_resid$data_raw))

as.matrix(resid_output_new$feat_recon - adni_resid$data_raw) %>% abs %>% mean
as.matrix(adni_resid$data_raw) %>% abs %>% mean
```
